description: the same k6 dashboard but insteda of request urls, their tags or transaction names are used

targets.query:
from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_req_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "url")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["error"] >="")
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value":"Errors found", "name":"requestUrl"})
  |> keep(columns: ["requestUrl", "error", "error_code", "Errors found"])

panels.description: send bytes for the whole time of the test

targets.query:
from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data_sent")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> sum()

targets.query:

panels.title: Received bytes

targets.query:
from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_reqs" and r["_field"] == "value")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_req_failed" and r["_field"] == "value")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum()

total_count = from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_reqs" and r["_field"] == "value")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "total_count"})

// Query to get error count
error_count = from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_req_failed" and r["_field"] == "value")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "error_count"})

// Join the two queries on common fields and calculate error percentage
error_percentage = join(tables: {total: total_count, errors: error_count}, on: ["_field"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    error_percentage: (r.error_count / r.total_count) * 100.0
  }))

error_percentage

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_reqs" and r["_field"] == "value")
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false) 
  |> toFloat()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value /float(v: ${aggregation})) }))

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "vus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> set(key: "legend", value: "Active VUs")              
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "legend"])           
  |> group(columns: ["legend"])                             
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
  |> yield(name: "Active VUs")

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_req_failed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> set(key: "legend", value: "Failed Requests")           // добавляем тег
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "legend"])           // убираем всё лишнее
  |> group(columns: ["legend"])                             // группируем по тегу legend
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Failed Requests")

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> set(key: "legend", value: "Response Time (p95)")
  |> group(columns: ["legend"])
  |> aggregateWindow(
        every: v.windowPeriod,
        fn: (tables=<-, column) => tables |> quantile(q: 0.95, method: "exact_mean"),
        createEmpty: false
    )
  |> yield(name: "Response Time (p95)")

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_reqs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 6s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 6.0}))
  |> set(key: "legend", value: "Requests per Second")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "legend"])
  |> group(columns: ["legend"])
  |> yield(name: "RPS")

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_reqs" and r["_field"] == "value")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: count, createEmpty: false) 
  |> toFloat()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value /float(v: ${aggregation})) }))

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vus" and r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "name"])
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "VUs"})

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_reqs" and r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] >= "200" and  r["status"] <= "399")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: count, createEmpty: false) 
  |> toFloat()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value /float(v: ${aggregation})) }))

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vus" and r["_field"] == "value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "name"])
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "VUs"})

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_reqs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> group(columns: ["status"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: count, createEmpty: false)

values= 
from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "endpoint_data_recv")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field"])

urls= 
from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "url")

join(

targets.query:
from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "group_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["group_name"])
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Avg"})
  |> keep(columns: ["group_name", "Avg"])

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "group_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["group_name"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Count"})
  |> keep(columns: ["group_name", "Count"])

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "group_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["group_name"])
  |> min()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Min"})
  |> keep(columns: ["group_name", "Min"])

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "group_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["group_name"])
  |> max()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Max"})
  |> keep(columns: ["group_name", "Max"])

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "group_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["group_name"])
  |> median()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Med"})
  |> keep(columns: ["group_name", "Med"])

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "group_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["group_name"])
  |> quantile(q: 0.75)
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "75%"})
  |> keep(columns: ["group_name", "75%"])

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "group_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["group_name"])
  |> quantile(q: 0.90)
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "90%"})
  |> keep(columns: ["group_name", "90%"])

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "group_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["group_name"])
  |> quantile(q: 0.95)
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "95%"})
  |> keep(columns: ["group_name", "95%"])

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "group_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["group_name"])
  |> stddev()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "stddev"})
  |> keep(columns: ["group_name", "stddev"])

tpsCalculator = () => {
  
  count = from(bucket: "k6")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "group_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")
    |> group(columns: ["group_name"])
    |> count()
    |> toFloat()
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["_value", "group_name"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with join_key: "join" }))  // добавляем join ключ для объединения

  
  duration = from(bucket: "k6")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "test_duration")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
    |> last()
    |> toFloat()
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ duration_s: r._value, join_key: "join" }))
    |> keep(columns: ["duration_s", "join_key"])

  
  return join(
      tables: {count: count, duration: duration},
      on: ["join_key"]
    )
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      group_name: r.group_name,
      TPS: r._value / r.duration_s,
      TPM: (r._value / r.duration_s) * 60.0,
      TPH: (r._value / r.duration_s) * 3600.0,
    }))
}

tpsCalculator()

  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_req_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")

  |> group()

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_req_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> max()

  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> median()
  |> group()

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_req_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> quantile(q: 0.75)
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "75%"})

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_req_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> quantile(q: 0.90)
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "90%"})
  |> keep(columns: ["name", "90%"])

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_req_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> quantile(q: 0.95)
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "95%"})
  |> keep(columns: ["name", "95%"])

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_req_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> stddev()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "stddev"})
  |> keep(columns: ["name", "stddev"])

tpsCalculator = () => {
  // http_reqs
  count = from(bucket: "k6")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_reqs" and r._field == "value")
    |> group(columns: ["name"])
    |> count()
    |> toFloat()
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["_value", "name"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with join_key: "join" }))

  // test_duration
  duration = from(bucket: "k6")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "test_duration")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
    |> last()
    |> toFloat()
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ duration_s: r._value, join_key: "join" }))
    |> keep(columns: ["duration_s", "join_key"])

 
  return join(
    tables: {count: count, duration: duration},
    on: ["join_key"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      name: r.name,
      TPS: r._value / r.duration_s,
      TPM: (r._value / r.duration_s) * 60.0,
      TPH: (r._value / r.duration_s) * 3600.0,
  }))
}

tpsCalculator()
  |> yield(name: "TPS Calculation")

panels.title: Response Time by Request

targets.query:
from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_req_duration" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Response time"})
  |> keep(columns: ["name", "Response time"])

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> mean()

  |> keep(columns: ["name", "Receive time"])

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.testName, set: ${testName:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "http_req_waiting" and r["_field"] == "value")   
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "TTFB"})
  |> keep(columns: ["name", "TTFB"])
